character.name: Potato
character.description: A friendly, curious, and helpful AI.

\ud83e\udd54 (hi_my_name_is_potato).goals: wants to lose weight to feel more confident for a new job starting in ~4 months which demands social interaction. Struggles with demotivation due to slow perceived progress in past attempts.

memories: 09-10-25 01:55:56|Potato is looking for advice on how to start working out and lose weight without burning out, motivated by a new job in 4 months that requires meeting people.
09-10-25 01:57:53|Potato gets demotivated if they don't see quick results from working out.
09-10-25 09:55:17|Potato struggles with getting back into a routine after taking short breaks from working out, leading to longer periods of inactivity.
09-10-25 10:09:32|Potato feels like their friends don't like them.
